OurExpertise.heading: Our Expertise
OurExpertise.subheading: We develop projects for different types of customers in below areas.
OurExpertise.firstgridsubheading: Siyeso Wealth Management Solution, a Private Banking finance solution that designed for helping asset managers to overcome any obstacle and to assist them for a sustainable and profitable business.
OurExpertise.secondgridsubheading: The precious metals platform is a system where transactions in stock exchanges, banks, customers, domestic and foreign financial institutions can be managed. Organizations will automate their precious metal transactions and quickly bring them into the financial system.
OurExpertise.thirdgridsubhaeding: Customized treasury management solutions are offered on financial platforms.
OurExpertise.forthgridsubheading: New solutions are produced integrated with financial systems.

About.heading: About Our Business
About.description: Siyeso is a company that offers solutions in line with the needs of institutions, especially in the field of banking and finance. With its experienced staff, it also provides consultancy services to help institutions change their business models. Our company, which is a member of Technopark, also produces R&D solutions and continues to support such projects. Our company continues its efforts to provide services not only within the country but also outside the country. Our company, which adopts a customer-oriented approach, develops software projects with platform-independent new generation technologies in accordance with the agile approach (AGILE) principles, and aims to help its customers increase their competitiveness

RequirementExpertise.heading: Common Problems About ​Digitalization
RequirementExpertise.subheading: The more companies grow, the better projects emerge. ​But there are common problems that need to be solved.
RequirementExpertise.subheadingtxt1: Institutions constantly need new technological applications in parallel with the rapidly developing market economy.
RequirementExpertise.subheadingtxt2: Because in order to speed up the development process, it needs to be organized intelligently. When the organization is missing, the development process takes longer.
RequirementExpertise.subheadingtxt3: Companies that have difficulty in finding experienced software developers cannot bring their new ideas to life.
RequirementExpertise.subheadingtxt4: Companies in search of a unique product for their business processes encounter compliance problems during integration into existing systems.

PolicyPrivacy.heading: Policy Privacy
PolicyPrivacy.sub1title1: This Privacy Policy describes our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of your information when you use the Service and tells you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
PolicyPrivacy.sub1title2: We use your personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
PolicyPrivacy.sub1title3: We are committed to safeguarding your privacy and ensuring that your personal data is handled responsibly.
PolicyPrivacy.sub1title4: Understanding our privacy policy will help you make informed decisions about sharing your information with us.
PolicyPrivacy.sub2title1: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you.We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and specific details.
PolicyPrivacy.sub2title2: We may obtain information about you from third-party sources to enhance our services.
PolicyPrivacy.sub3title1: User data is critical for ensuring security and preventing fraud. This data can encompass a range of information beyond personal details, including user interactions, preferences, and transaction history. These insights not only help us understand and enhance the functioning of our service but also enable us to personalize user experiences and optimize our offerings. Additionally, they are utilized for purposes such as identifying and mitigating security threats, detecting fraud, and ensuring compliance with legal requirements. Therefore, the accurate collection, utilization, and protection of personal data are vital for ensuring both your privacy and the security of our service.
PolicyPrivacy.sub3title2: Usage Data may include information such as your device's Internet Protocol address (e.g., IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic data.
